turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Silsesquioxane.
turn.2: Silsesquioxane A silsesquioxane is an organosilicon compound with the chemical formula [RSiO] (R = H, alkyl, aryl or alkoxyl).
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Silsesquioxanes are colorless solids that adopt cage-like or polymeric structures with Si-O-Si linkages and tetrahedral Si vertices.
turn.5: What do they do with silsesquioxane?
turn.6: Silsesquioxanes are members of polyoctahedral silsesquioxanes ("POSS"), which have attracted attention as precursors to ceramic materials and nanocomposites.
turn.8: Diverse substituents (R) can be attached to the Si centers.
turn.9: What else is known about the substituents?
turn.10: The molecules are unusual because they feature an inorganic silicate core and an organic exterior.
turn.11: What are some important aspects of the organic exterior?
turn.12: The silica core confers rigidity and thermal stability.
